title: Improving the photoelectrocatalytic efficiency of CuWO4 through molybdenum for tungsten substitution and coupling with BiVO4
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00161C, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Annalisa Polo, Maria Vittoria Dozzi, Gianluigi Marra, Kevin Sivula, Elena Selli
IMPS analysis demonstrates the improved charge separation in CuW0.5Mo0.5O4 compared to CuWO4, which is further enhanced upon coupling with BiVO4.
